entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 2:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
